title: [Large-scale] Virtual World-Based Motivational Interviewing Training Program for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and patient counseling experience
context.additional_context: Program providing immersive motivational interviewing skill training in virtual environments for aspiring or practicing healthcare professionals.

learning_goals: Apply the four core techniques of motivational interviewing (open-ended questions, affirmative reinforcement, change exploration, resistance acceptance) with 80% accuracy through virtual patient interactions
Successfully implement patient motivation strategies in real clinical scenarios at least three times
Improve counseling skills by over 20% through peer evaluation and simulation records
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
